chapter.text: 70|1|(napiye! Nirakarippavarkalukkuc) campavikkakkutiya vetanaiyaip parri ketpavan oruvan (um'mitam atu) eppolutu varumena(p parikacamaka)k ketkiran
70|2|nirakarippavarkalukku (atu campavikkum camayattil) atait tatuttu vitakkutiyavan oruvanumillai
70|3|uyarp pataikalaiyutaiya allahvinal (atu campavikkum)
70|4|annalil vanavarkalum, jiprayilum avanitam poyc ceruvarkal. (Annal) aimpatinayiram varutankalukkuc camamaka irukkum
70|5|(napiye!) Nir nerttiyana cantattotu poruttiruppiraka
70|6|(eninum,) niccayamaka avarkal atai veku turamaka ennukinranar
70|7|namo atai veku camipamakak kankirom
70|8|annalil vanam palukkak kaynta cempaippol akivitum
70|9|Malaikal pancaip pol aki (parantu) vitum
70|10|oru nanpan marroru nanpanai(p partta potilum avanutaiya cukattai) vicarikka mattan
70|11|avarkal oruvar marravaraip parttuk kolvarkal. Kurravali, annalil tan vetanaikkup parikaramakat tan pillaikalaiyum
70|12|tan manaivikalaiyum, tan cakotaranaiyum
70|13|tannai atarittu vanta tan contakkararkalaiyum
70|14|innum, pumiyilulla anaittaiyume kotuttenum tannaik kapparrikkollap piriyappatuvan
70|15|(eninum) atu akakkutiyatalla. Niccayamaka atu narakattin neruppu. (Ivanaic culntu kollum)
70|16|atu tolkalai erittu (mulaiyai urukki) vitum
70|17|puramkattic cenru purakkanittavarkalai ellam atu alaikkum
70|18|(porulaic) cekarittu(c celavu ceyyatu) pattirappatutti vaittiruntavarkalaiyum (tannitam alaikkum)
70|19|meyyakave manitan patarrakkaranakave pataikkappattullan
70|20|enenral, avanai oru tinku ataintal, (titukkittu) natunkukiran
70|21|avanai oru nanmai ataintalo, atai (tarmam ceyyatu) tatuttuk kolkiran
70|22|ayinum, tolukaiyalikalait tavira
70|23|avarkal tankal tolukaiyait tavaratu tolutu varuvarkal
70|24|avarkalutaiya porulkalil (elaikalukkuk) kurippitta panku untu
70|25|ataik ketpavarkalukkum (vetkattal ketkata) variyavarkalukkum (kotupparkal)
70|26|kuli kotukkum nalaiyum avarkal unmai enre nampukinranar
70|27|(ivvariruntum) avarkal tankal iraivanin vetanaikkup payantu konte irupparkal
70|28|(enenral,) niccayamakat tankal iraivanin vetanai accamarrirukkak kutiyatalla
70|29|avarkal, tankal marmastanattaiyum patukattuk kolvarkal
70|30|Ayinum, tankal manaivikalitattilum, tankal atimaip penkalitattilum tavira. Niccayamaka avarkal (ivarkalutan campantappatuvataip parri) nintikkappata mattarkal
70|31|itaittavira (marretaiyum) evarenum virumpinal, attakaiyavarkal varampu miriyavarkalavarkal
70|32|innum, evarkal, tankalitam (nampi) oppataikkappatta amanitap porulkalaiyum, (tankal ceyta) vakkurutikalaiyum peni, (yokkiyamaka natantu) kolkirarkalo avarkalum
70|33|innum, evarkal, tankal catciyattil (tavarilaikkatu) urutiyaka irukkirarkalo avarkalum
70|34|innum, evarkal tolukaiyaiyum kavanittu(t tavaratu) olunkakat tolutu varukirarkalo avarkalum
70|35|akiya ivarkaltan corkkattil kanniyappatuttappatuvarkal
70|36|(napiye!) Innirakarippavarkalukku enna cutantiram? (Avarkal) umakku mun oti varukinranar
70|37|valatu puramiruntum, itatu puramiruntum kuttam kuttamaka (oti varukinranar)
70|38|avarkalil ovvoruvarum inpam tarum corkkattil nulaintu vitalamenru acaippatukinranara
70|39|atu akappovatillai. Avarkal arinta or (arpa) vastuvilirunte nam avarkalaip pataittirukkirom
70|40|kilakku marrum merkut ticaiyin iraivanmitu cattiyamaka! Niccayamaka nam (nam viruppappati ceyya) arralutaiyom
70|41|(ivarkalai nikki) ivarkalaivita melanavarkalai marrivitavum (arralutaiyom!) Itil nam iyalatavarkalalla
70|42|akave, (napiye!) Avarkalukku vakkalikkappatta nalai avarkal cantikkum varai, avarkal vilaiyatikkontum, (vin kariyankalil) alntu kitakkumarum avarkalai nir vittuvituviraka

70|43|(Napiye!) Avarkalukku oru nalai nir napakamuttuviraka. (Cilai vanankupavarkal tankal tirunalkalil pujaikkaka nattuvaikkappatta) kotikalin pakkam viraintotuvataip polave, camatikaliliruntu velippattu (hasrutaiya maitanattirku) veku tiviramakac celvarkal
70|44|(annalil) payanta parvaiyutan otuvarkal. Ilivum avarkalaic culntu kollum. (Napiye!) Innaltan avarkalukku vakkalikkappatta nalakum
